altername_name: Chō Jikū Yōsai Macross: Ai Oboete Imasu ka
Chou Jikuu Yousai Macross: Ai Oboete Imasu ka
name: The Super Dimension Fortress Macross: Do You Remember Love?
overview: The Super Dimension Fortress Macross: Do You Remember Love? is a 2D shooter adaptation of the 1984 anime film of the same title, released exclusively in Japan on the Sega Saturn in 1997, the Sony PlayStation in 1999 and the PlayStation 3 in 2012 (through digital download). The Saturn version was released to coincide with the 15th anniversary of the Macross franchise. Packaged in two CDs, the game features video footage of the original film plus all-new animated sequences.
